name: Learning Curve Life Skills Foundation
briefDescription: We exist because we believe that every child, regardless of socio-economic status, has the right to realize oneâ€™s own potential as a human being.We particularly care about children from under resourced and vulnerable backgrounds, and their ability to thrive and adapt to a fast changing world. Our mission is to empower children from under resourced and vulnerable environments to have access to equitable adulthood outcomes.We effect this through an approach of social-emotional development for the children, their teachers and the learning environment, and are currently working with over 5000 children and 180 teachers in underserved schools in Hyderabad and Chennai

address: near Dundigal Air Force Academy, Narasapur Road
